results.title: Magic of a name
results.creator_credit: David Cobham, Ronald H. Riley, Film Producers Guild and R.H.R. Productions
results.brief_description: An account of the work and products of the Rolls-Royce group of companies. Surveying the activities of the main divisions - aero engines; commercial and military petrol engines; diesel engines, and motor cars - illustrates products using the sponsor’s engines, including the Comet 4 and other aircraft, Rolls-Royce and Bentley cars, trucks, locomotives and tractors.

results.title: Magic molecule
results.creator_credit: Christopher Chapman, Hugh O'Connor, Nicholas Balla and ONF | NFB
results.brief_description: A film showing the new world created by the techniques and processes of the plastics industry. Transmuted from coal, oil or wood, synthetic substances can make thousands of new products, from silk threads to furniture. With a light and lively treatment, this film explores the colorful, versatile world of these synthetic materials.

results.title: Magic Michael
results.creator_credit: Morton Schindel and Weston Woods Studios
results.brief_description: A story film for children, based on Louis Slobodkin’s book. “Michael wasn’t happy just being my brother, he wanted to be something - something or other.” Michael turns himself into anything from a pup to a bear or a chair. This story about an imaginative little boy is told in rhyming couplets, with visuals based on the original illustrations to the book. Storyteller: Owen Jordan.

results.title: Magic in the air
results.brief_description: A simple explanation with animated diagrams shows the basic principles of television. This film takes you behind the scenes of television studios at Radio City, the construction of the iconoscope which is the sender and the kinescope which is the receiver.

results.title: Magic canvas
results.brief_description: An experiment in the use of the animated cartoon as a new art medium employing to best advantage movement, color and music to convey the ideas of the artists. No narration, music only.

results.title: Maggie Mcgowan
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Your life in their hands”.
Part of series of medical films produced at a London hospital. The camera follows the surgeons operating on Mrs. McGowan as they introduce remarkable techniques in modern medicine to save her from cancer of the bowel.

results.title: Maggie Kuhn: wrinkled radical
results.creator_credit: Howard Weinberg and WNET (Television station : New York, N.Y.)
results.brief_description: Maggie Kuhn who helped establish the Gray Panter Movement in America discusses aspects of old age, human sexuality and medical care. Interviewed by Studs Terkel.
